title: Claire of the Moon
description: From writer-director Nicole Conn, creator of the film which has captured lesbian hearts everywhere… the whole story. Every detail of the beautifully erotic, haunting tale of one woman’s journey to herself. And of another woman’s journey through fear to intimacy. Claire Jabrowski, weary of wandering through a maze of one-night stands… Dr. Noel Benedict, the therapist who cannot heal her own loss and despair… Two women who have paid a great price for their place in the world meet at a writer’s colony on the brooding coast of Oregon. Follow their journey through strife and denial to heated courtship… to self-discovery… to intimacy... to love. Originally published by Naiad Press 1993.
author: Nicole Conn
